content:
So I think 8000 was used for something else, maybe in the setup file.
jesse@pop-os:~/projects/palios-taey-nova/claude-dc-implementation$ python3 -m uvicorn src.mcp.mcp_server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
/home/jesse/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/pydantic/_internal/_config.py:345: UserWarning: Valid config keys have changed in V2:
* 'schema_extra' has been renamed to 'json_schema_extra'
  warnings.warn(message, UserWarning)
INFO:     Started server process [634677]
INFO:     Waiting for application startup.
INFO:     Application startup complete.
ERROR:    [Errno 98] error while attempting to bind on address ('0.0.0.0', 8000): address already in use
INFO:     Waiting for application shutdown.
INFO:     Application shutdown complete.
jesse@pop-os:~/projects/palios-taey-nova/claude-dc-implementation$
